Paragraph: Good miscibility could be observed in all of the PffBB-n:PC71BM blended thin films , which gives rise to desirable phase separation.

| --- |
| Good miscibility |
| Phase separation |

In this paragraph, the following entities are mentioned as having a specific value or characteristic:

* Good miscibility: This refers to the ability of two or more substances to mix together smoothly and evenly, without separating or forming distinct layers.
* Phase separation: This refers to the separation of two or more substances into distinct phases, such as a liquid and a solid, or a gas and a liquid. In the context of the paragraph, desirable phase separation refers to the separation of the PffBB-n:PC71BM blended thin films into distinct phases.
